newsitem.title: USA: Spyglass to expand Partner Services.
newsitem.headline: Spyglass to expand Partner Services.

text.p: Spyglass Inc said Monday it will expand its Partner Services division, by more than doubling its existing staff of 19 by hiring people with expertise in the device marketplace.
Partner Services offers enhanced customer service and support to customers that use Spylass technology in their products, a Spyglass spokesman said.

"Device customers will not tolerate inexperienced phone support personnel trying to answer questions from 2,000 miles away. They want experienced software developers willing and able to do whatever it takes to help them get quality products to market quickly," Rich Houle, executive vice president of research and development, said in a statement. "We're enhancing Partner Services with this frame of mind."
Partner Services will work with licensing customers for an additional fee to provide services on an ongoing or per-project basis, including technical support, training and custom design services.
